description:
Reciva is the premier internet radio app for webOS.
The app provides access to the Reciva database of 20,000+ radio stations from all over the world, including LOCAL, AM, FM, DAB, HD, DMB, SATELLITE & INTERNET ONLY.

It is the only Internet Radio app with official access to 3rd party streaming services and real-time integration with your Reciva based radio or online Reciva account at http://radios.reciva.com

Key Features

- Reciva Radio directory featuring over 20,000 live streams, 30,000 on-demand streams and 10,000+ podcasts
- Store favourites directly to the app or via the Reciva website
- Browse by Location, Genre or search by Keyword
- Browse by Network,  including BBC Iplayer radio, Live365, AccuRadio
- Access 3rd Party Streaming services, including Aupeo!, DAR.FM, MP3tunes
- Play all stream formats including AAC, MP3, WMA and Ogg Vorbis
- Add your own podcast feeds to your favourites list (via the website)
- Create folders of your favourite stations so you can easily access lists
- Enter your custom URLs for stations not available on the Reciva database

** Change Log  **
Version 1.1.2
Improves connectivity to Reciva servers

Version 1.0.9
Fix to enable streaming when the screen is off.

Version 1.0.8
* Prevents standby while streaming to fix streaming issue that affected Touchpad and Pre 3 while in standby and not on charge
* Fixed UI glitches that affected Touchpad
* Other bug fixes
